Package camzup.core

Class MeshEntity3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Entity
camzup.core.Entity3
camzup.core.MeshEntity3
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, ISpatial3, IUtils, IVolume, IVolume3, java.lang.Iterable<Mesh3>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageEntity3
public class MeshEntity3
extends Entity3
implements java.lang.Iterable<Mesh3>, IVolume3
An entity which contains a transform that is applied to a list of meshes. The meshes may references a list of materials by index.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.List<Mesh3> meshes
    The list of meshes held by the entity.

    • toBlenderCode

      public java.lang.String toBlenderCode()
      Returns a String of Python code targeted toward the Blender 2.8x API. This code is brittle and is used for internal testing purposes, i.e., to compare how curve geometry looks in Blender (the control) versus in the library (the test).
      Returns:
      the string

    • toBlenderCode

      public java.lang.String toBlenderCode​(MaterialSolid[] materials, float gamma, float metallic, float roughness, float specular, float clearcoat, float clearcoatRough)
      Returns a String of Python code targeted toward the Blender 2.8x API. This code is brittle and is used for internal testing purposes, i.e., to compare how mesh geometry looks in Blender (the control) versus in the library (the test).
      Parameters:
      materials - the materials
      gamma - color gamma adjustment
      metallic - metallic factor
      roughness - roughness factor
      specular - specular highlight strength
      clearcoat - clear coat factor
      clearcoatRough - clear coat roughness
      Returns:
      the string

      public java.lang.String toString()

      Returns:
      the string

      Parameters:
      places - number of places
      truncate - count before list is truncated
      Returns:
      the string
